metadata.synopsis: Spoke to Rolan right before the final battle.

0.speaker: Rolan
0.text: You have the full force of Ramazith's Tower, and its dashing master, at your side, my friend. Let us finish this.
0.context: NodeContext: genuine, he'd follow the player into hell itself

1.speaker: Rolan
1.text: My flames will be ready - simply say the word, and the skies shall rain fire.
1.context: NodeContext: genuine, he'd follow the player into hell itself
